TextView.android:text: During pregnancy did the woman seek care for routine antenatal care?
Kya doran e hamaal ma na kisi sa antenatal care hasil k th
Whom did the woman seek ANC?
Antenatal care kahan sa and kiss a li gay the
How many times during this pregnancy, did she seek antenatal care from a health provider?
Haamal k doran kitni dafa kisi tibbi mahir sa antenatal care li ha
During which month of the pregnancy, she went to receive woman last antenatal care from health provider?
Haamal k kis mahinay ma antenatal care lainay aurat tibbi mahir k pass gay
During this pregnancy, did she get any injection in the arm to prevent Tetanus, i.e. convulsion after delivery?
Haamal k doran koi teeka laga tha tetanus sa bacho k
How many times did she get these injections?
Yeh teeka kitni dafa laga tha
Before this pregnancy was she suffering from any of the following known illnesses?
\n Is hamaal sa pehlay kya us ko in ma sa koi beemari th
3. Tetanus k injection k tarteeb bata di
Did the woman has any of these or danger signs or symptom/s in last 3 months of this pregnancy, but before labor started?
\n In ma koi bh khatray k aalmaat zahir hoi ha pichlay 3 mahinay k hamaal ma, bachay k dard sa pehlay
\n(Remind the respondent that labor starts with painful contractions every 20 minutes or less)
Maa ko aghaa karain k labor ka matlab dard ka hona hota har 20 minutes aur us sa kaam waqt ma
2. Peeshap k nali na koi masla
3. Bleeding from vagina ( before labor pain)
3. Bachay dani sa khoon ka ana
9. Saans ma muhskil ya jaldi jaldi saans ana
10. Severe anemia (pale and shortness of breath)
11. Severe bleeding from vagina during labour pain or delivery
11. Bachay dani sa khoon ka zaya hona bacha paida kartay Howay
12. Too weak to get out of bed
13. Khoon ma soogar k miqdar zayda hona
14. Badboodar maawad peeshap wali jaga sa
15. Qabal az waqt bacha paida honay k alaamat
19. Maa k pait ma jis bag ma bacha hota ha us ma pani k kami
20. Maa k pait ma jis bag ma bacha hota ha us ma pani k zayda hona
25. Koi aur masla PW ko us k detail likhain
Did woman seek any care for any of above mentioned danger signs or symptom/s in last 3 months of this pregnancy, but before labor started?
In ma sa jo khatray k aalmaat hoi han tu kya maa na un k ilaj karwaya sirf last 3 mahinay k hamal ma
Did woman seek care to any of these?
Aurat sehat k mashwaray k liya kya in ma sa kahin gay
Did woman receive any of the treatment?
\n Aurat na kya kisi kisam ka ilaj karwaya
1. (Moun sa khanay wali infection khatam karnay wali deewai)
2. (Moun sa khanay wali malaria k deewai)
3. (Moun sa khanay wali blood pressure kaam karnay k dewai)
8. (Moun sa khanay wali folic acid k goli)
9. (Moun sa khanay wali koi aur goli)
9. (Moun sa khanay wali koi aur goli)
